task.title: Customize HTML5 output
task.shortdesc: The iiRDS plugin allows you to customize the HTML5 content of the iiRDS package.

taskbody.context: A project wants to generate an iiRDS package that contains custom HTML5 content that uses the project's CSS.

step.cmd: In the bin folder of your DITA-OT installation, open a command-line client.
In the command-line client, enter the dita command to transform your DITA map or topic using the iirds transtype and the HTML5 parameters to use your CSS and XSLT.

taskbody.result: An iiRDS package with the following file name is created in the output directory: <file_name_of_ditamap>.iirds. The iiRDS package contains HTML files generated by the project's XSLT and using the project's CSS.
